name: The Whimsical Adventures of Mr. Detective
name_original: The Whimsical Adventures of Mr. Detective
description:
The Whimsical Adventures of Mr. Detective Ep.1 The Spirit World, is a 2D side-scrolling action/adventure game where you play as Mr. Detective. A soul has been lost, and it is up to Mr. Detective to recover it.

 Journey through the city streets and step into the spirit world, fighting the creatures within, and see if you can reach the lost soul before the spirit world claims you for good...
